title: Controller inputs don't work in apps
content:
I have an xbox 1 s controller that I can successfully connect to the phone, the controller works on the android UI with the control stick and buttons, but I've tried 2 apps, steam link and CODM, and both of them see a controller but the inputs do not work on either app.
The only thing I can find close to a google search was another community post that had no answer but was closed.
